name: linked-list

scripts.test-travis: istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks -u exports test.js
scripts.lint: npm run lint-api && npm run lint-test && npm run lint-style

scripts.build: npm run build-md && npm run build-bundle && npm run build-mangle
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-coverage
